content.text:
> Bearing in mind that our encryption will probably be broken at some point, and your feed could be leaked in some unfortunate situationsâ€¦

Just to add to this, we don't currently have forward secrecy, so any private key leak will leak *all* past private messages. Any attacker with the knowledge of your private key will be able to read any and all private messages, which is a bit scary given how well cryptographic protocols tend to age.
